steps.name: Scenario: Background iscan subcommands for recovery point, not infected entities
✔  Given I create default ntfs filesystem with 1 GIB size
✔  And I create file system tree with splitting 20 MIB between files, 1 tree depth and with sparse files
✔  And I backup created block device
✔  And I run background ransomware scan for recovery-point
✔  Then I check background iscan ransomware report for not infected entities

✔  And I run background full scan for recovery-point
